org.apache.hadoop.mapred

クラス KeyValueTextInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileInputFormat<Text,Text>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.KeyValueTextInputFormat
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    InputFormat<Text,Text>, JobConfigurable

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class KeyValueTextInputFormat
extends FileInputFormat<Text,Text>
implements JobConfigurable
    An InputFormat for plain text files. Files are broken into lines. Either linefeed or carriage-return are used to signal end of line. Each line is divided into key and value parts by a separator byte. If no such a byte exists, the key will be the entire line and value will be empty.

    • フィールドの概要

      • クラスから継承されたフィールド org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileInputFormat

        INPUT_DIR_RECURSIVE, LOG, NUM_INPUT_FILES

        public void configure(JobConf conf)

      • isSplitable

        protected boolean isSplitable(FileSystem fs,
                  Path file)
        クラスからコピーされた説明: FileInputFormat
        Is the given filename splitable? Usually, true, but if the file is stream compressed, it will not be. FileInputFormat implementations can override this and return false to ensure that individual input files are never split-up so that Mappers process entire files.
        オーバーライド:
        isSplitable クラス内 FileInputFormat<Text,Text>
        パラメータ:
        fs - the file system that the file is on
        file - the file name to check
        戻り値:
        is this file splitable?

      • getRecordReader

        public RecordReader<Text,Text> getRecordReader(InputSplit genericSplit,
                                      JobConf job,
                                      Reporter reporter)
                                        throws IOException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: InputFormat
        Get the RecordReader for the given InputSplit.

        It is the responsibility of the RecordReader to respect record boundaries while processing the logical split to present a record-oriented view to the individual task.

        定義:
        getRecordReader インタフェース内 InputFormat<Text,Text>
        定義:
        getRecordReader クラス内 FileInputFormat<Text,Text>
        パラメータ:
        genericSplit - the InputSplit
        job - the job that this split belongs to
        戻り値:
        a RecordReader
        例外:
        IOException
